item.title: â€˜A devastating forceâ€™: how recent Mediterranean storms turned to tragedies
item.description:
Atmospheric machine-gun has fired storm after deadly storm at the region this year, leaving a trail of widespread destruction For AndrÃ©s SÃ¡nchez Barea, in Spain, it was the fear that arose when water started to spurt from plug sockets. For Nelson Duarte, in Portugal, it was the helplessness that hit as violent winds smacked down trees and tore tiles from roofs. For Amal Essuide, in Morocco, it was the reality that dawned when a corpse was pulled onboard a boat in the flooded medina. Each moment ...
